items.name: 3d Printer
items.description: Prints items that can be used to craft turrets, traps, and machines.

items.name: Weapon Printer
items.description: Prints shootable weapons.

items.name: Craft Bench old
items.description: Hacker

items.name: Craft Bench
items.description: Make stuff here.

items.name: Decrypter
items.description: Used to decrypt Tech Drives, progressing research progress in the tech tree.

items.name: Dev Wall Trap
items.description: Dev Wall Trap

items.name: Disassembler
items.description: Converts specific enemy types into resources.

items.name: Enemy Splitter
items.description: Pushes specified enemy type onto a different path while allowing ground units to proceed.

items.name: Ground Air Splitter
items.description: Pushes air units onto a different path while allowing ground units to proceed.

items.name: Bomb Trap
items.description: Creates a micro explosion, damaging and pushing any enemy nearby.

items.name: Iron Fuel Generator
items.description: Converts energy into usable electricity by a Power System.

items.name: Magnet Trap
items.description: Creates a strong magnetic field, causing robots to group together.

items.name: Stun Trap
items.description: Creates a micro EMP pulse, stunning nearby robots.

items.name: Makeshift Gun Turret
items.description: Low quality gun turret made from enemy scraps. Fires scrap pellets.

items.name: Assembler Machine
items.description: Assembles parts together to create objects.

items.name: Filament Spooler
items.description: Manufactures spools of material for the 3d printer.

items.name: Research Analyzer
items.description: Analyzer for Cell Drives. Able to manipulate cell data to match cell content of more advanved Drives.

items.name: Ore Harvester
items.description: Creates a harvester station and harvester bot that automatically finds and collects valuable ore from ore fields.

items.name: Node Harvester
items.description: Builds a Node Harvester that automatically finds and harvests materials.

items.name: Combat Bot Printer
items.description: Creates robots to fight for you.

items.name: Ammo Factory
items.description: Probably makes ammo.

items.name: Blast Furnace
items.description: Used to create metal from ore.

items.name: Bot Factory
items.description: Prints robots.

items.name: Material Processor
items.description: Separates valuable materials from salvaged segments.

items.name: Material Processor 2
items.description: Processes raw scraps and rocks into useful materials.

items.name: Panel Factory
items.description: Prints panels which can be used to expand your base's walls and floors.

items.name: Recycler
items.description: Destroys items and returns any usable materials.

items.name: Weapon Bench
items.description: Upgrades weapons

items.name: Beam Spinner
items.description: Spins and hits stuff.

items.name: Scrap Collector
items.description:
Collects scraps from fallen mechanical enemies.
Can be made in the Assembler Machine.

items.name: Laser Trap
items.description: Emits a laser pulse that deals damage to passing enemies.

items.name: Shock Trap
items.description: Attacks nearby robots with chain lightning.

items.name: Scrap Slow Trap
items.description: Slows the enemy down.

items.name: Spike Trap
items.description: Spike Trap.

items.name: Tesla Turret
items.description: Electrocutes nearby enemies causing damage (AOE).

items.name: Laserbeam Turret
items.description: Deployable Laser Turret.

items.name: Gun Turret
items.description: Shoots energy bullets at enemies from a long distance. Uses medium ammo. Requires power.

items.name: Rocket Turret
items.description: Turret that shoots rockets.

items.name: Power Distributor
items.description: Provides nearby buildings and machinery with wireless power.

items.name: Push Trap
items.description: Pushes any units in its path.

items.name: Scrap Ammo Maker
items.description: Used to make scrap ammo.

items.name: Scrap Battery Crate
items.description:
Provides additional storage capacity.
Capacity: 10 kWh

items.name: Scrap Blast Furnace
items.description:
Used to create metal from ore.
Can be crafted at the Craft Bench.
Can be manufactured by Assembler Machines.

items.name: Scrap Bot Factory
items.description: Used to manufacture automation bots.

items.name: Scrap Bot Pickup Crate
items.description: Storage box with 2 automated pickup bots.

items.name: Scrap Build Panel
items.description:
Base panel. Use to place machinery on and redirect enemies into new paths.
Activate Wall Placement Mode with the horizontal, diagonal, or vertical wall keys.

items.name: Scrap Constructor
items.description:
Used to upgrade sub components to higher tiered components.
Can be crafted at the Craft Bench.
Can be manufactured by Assembler Machines.

items.name: Scrap Extractor
items.description: Used to extract parts from bot scraps.

items.name: Scrap Land Mine
items.description: Scrap explosive landmine. Explodes when pressure is applied. Also triggers when shot.

items.name: Scrap Rock Harvester
items.description:
Automatic Rock Harvest Machine. Axe can break Mars Rock, Basalt, and Dolomite. 
Can be crafted at the Craft Bench.
Can be manufactured by Assembler Machines.

items.name: Scrap Solar Panel
items.description:
Converts energy from the Sun into electricity.
Can be crafted at the Craft Bench.
Can be manufactured by Assembler Machines.

items.name: Scrap Storage Crate
items.description:
Personal storage crate. 
Can be crafted at the Craft Bench.
Can be manufactured by Assembler Machines.
Capacity: 10

items.name: Scrap Wind Turbine Generator
items.description:
Captures energy created by wind.
Can be crafted at the Craft Bench.
Can be manufactured by Assembler Machines.

items.name: Storage Crate
items.description:
Personal storage crate. 
Capacity: 18

items.name: Scrap Electrocution Trap
items.description: Electrocutes nearby enemies causing damage (AOE).

items.name: Scrap Fuel Generator
items.description:
Converts energy cells for use in the Power System. 
The device automatically supplies power to Power Distributors in a Power System Segment.

items.name: Scrap Laser Trap
items.description:
A continuous wave laser mounted onto a Scrap Tripod Base.
Strong against ground enemies.
Stays on as long as the device is receiving power.

items.name: Scrap Launcher Turret
items.description:
Uses an electromagnet to propel scrap pellets at nearby enemies. Uses Scrap Pellets.
Can be crafted at the Craft Bench.
Can be manufactured by Assembler Machines.

items.name: Scrap Spike Trap
items.description:
Makeshift spike trap. Quickly deploys metal rods using a spring mechanism.
Pierces ground units, but pops hover units into the air.
Can be crafted at the Craft Bench.
Can be manufactured by Assembler Machines.

items.name: Scrap Spinner Melee Trap
items.description: Makeshift melee trap made from scrap metal. Strong against hover/air bots.

items.name: Scrap Spring Trap
items.description:
Makeshift spring trap. Quickly deploys upward force using springs.
Can be crafted at the Craft Bench.
Can be manufactured by Assembler Machines.

items.name: Floor Panel
items.description:
Makeshift spike trap. Quickly deploys metal rods using a spring mechanism.
Pierces ground units, but pops hover units into the air.
Can be crafted at the Craft Bench.
Can be manufactured by Assembler Machines.

items.name: Sloped Floor Panel
items.description:
Makeshift spike trap. Quickly deploys metal rods using a spring mechanism.
Pierces ground units, but pops hover units into the air.
Can be crafted at the Craft Bench.
Can be manufactured by Assembler Machines.

items.name: Wall Panel
items.description:
Makeshift spike trap. Quickly deploys metal rods using a spring mechanism.
Pierces ground units, but pops hover units into the air.
Can be crafted at the Craft Bench.
Can be manufactured by Assembler Machines.

items.name: Build Panel
items.description:
Base panel. Use to place machinery on and redirect enemies into new paths.
Activate Wall Placement Mode with the horizontal, diagonal, or vertical wall keys.

items.name: Aluminum Filament
items.description: Filament used by 3d printers to make objects.

items.name: Iron Filament
items.description: Filament used by 3d printers to make objects.

items.name: Magnesium Filament
items.description: Filament used by 3d printers to make objects.

items.name: Titanium Filament
items.description: Filament used by 3d printers to make objects.

items.name: Glass Fragment
items.description:
Piece of glass salvaged from debris. Used to craft items.
Can be found by recycling scrap robot pieces.

items.name: Gun Parts
items.description: Usable scraps and parts that are used to craft and upgrade weapons.

items.name: Salvaged Wires
items.description:
Wires salvaged from debris. Used to craft items.
Can be found by recycling scrap robot pieces.

items.name: Scrap Wire
items.description: Standard Electrical Wire

items.name: Servo Motor
items.description:
Mini electrical motors salvaged from debris. Used to craft items.
Can be found by recycling scrap robot pieces.

items.name: Small Electric Motor
items.description:
Working electric motor pieced together from scrap parts. Converts electrical energy into mechanical energy. Used to craft defenses.
Can be crafted at the craft bench.

items.name: Aluminum Ore
items.description:
Aluminum Ore. Used for crafting.
Obtained from processing Bauxite in the material processor.

items.name: Copper Ore
items.description:
Used for crafting.
Can be smelted in a furnace.

items.name: Iron Ore
items.description:
Iron Ore. Used for crafting.
Obtained from processing Mars Rock and Basalt in the material processor.

items.name: Magnesium Ore
items.description:
Magnesium Ore. Used for crafting.
Obtained from processing Dolomite in the material processor.

items.name: Silica Sand
items.description:
Used for crafting.
Can be smelted in a furnace.

items.name: Titanium Ore
items.description:
Titanium Ore. Used for crafting.
Obtained from processing Meteorite in the material processor.

items.name: Aluminum Bar
items.description:
Iron metal.  Used to create lightweight metal objects.
Obtained from smelting Aluminum Ore in a Blast Furnace.

items.name: Copper Ingot
items.description:
Used for crafting materials.
Obtained from smelting Copper Ore in a Blast Furnace.

items.name: Electromagnet
items.description:
Creates a strong magnetic field produced by an electric current.
Can be crafted at the Craft Bench.
Can be manufactured by Assembler Machines.

items.name: Glass Lens
items.description: Standard glass lens.

items.name: Glass
items.description: Used to craft items.

items.name: Iron Cog
items.description: Used to craft items.

items.name: Iron Ingot
items.description:
Iron metal.  Used to create panels and machines.
Obtained from smelting Iron Ore in a Blast Furnace.

items.name: Iron Plate
items.description: Used to craft items.

items.name: Iron Tube
items.description: Used to craft items.

items.name: Laser
items.description: Used to craft items.

items.name: Magnesium Bar
items.description:
Metal. 
Obtained from smelting Magnesium Ore in a Blast Furnace.

items.name: Scrap Gear
items.description: Used to craft items.

items.name: Scrap Tripod Base
items.description:
A useful base made from Paragon scraps. Can be used to craft items.
Can be crafted at the Craft Bench.

items.name: Tech Module 1
items.description: Used by Decrypters to research new technologies.

items.name: Titanium
items.description:
Titanium metal.  Used to create advanced metal objects.
Obtained from smelting Titanium Ore in a Blast Furnace.

items.name: AI Core
items.description: Artificial Intelligence module used to create automation bots.

items.name: Poisonous Plant
items.description:
Poisonous plant. Extremely acidic.
Can be found along large rocks and shaded areas.

items.name: Power Crystal
items.description: Used in power crystal generators.

items.name: Scrap Battery
items.description:
Scrap Battery made with plant acid and scrap metal.
Can be crafted at the Craft Bench.
Can be manufactured by Assembler Machines.

items.name: Weak Explosive Powder
items.description:
Low quality thermite created by mixing Iron Oxide (Oxidizer) and Magnesium Powder (Fuel). 
Used to make explosive items.

items.name: Laser Diode
items.description:
Standard laser diode. 
Commonly found when recycling computers.

items.name: Repair Kit
items.description: Repairs buildings, traps, and turrets.

items.name: Basalt
items.description:
Contains useful minerals. Can be processed with a Material Processor machine.
Composition: Iron
Traces of Niobium, Silicon, Lithium, and Cobalt.

items.name: Bauxite
items.description:
Contains useful minerals. Can be processed with a Material Processor machine.
Composition: High levels of Aluminum.
Traces of Niobium, Silicon, Lithium, and Cobalt.

items.name: Dolomite
items.description:
Contains useful minerals. Can be processed with a Material Processor machine.
Composition: High levels of Magnesium.
Traces of Niobium, Silicon, Lithium, and Cobalt.

items.name: Meteorite
items.description:
Contains useful minerals. Can be processed with a Material Processor machine.
Composition: High levels of Titanium and Chromium.
Traces of Niobium, Silicon, Lithium, and Cobalt.

items.name: Mars Rock
items.description:
Contains useful minerals. Can be processed with a Material Processor machine.
Composition: Low levels of Iron, Molybdenuim, Magnesium, and other rocks.
Traces of Niobium, Silicon, Lithium, and Cobalt.

items.name: CellStorageDrive
items.description:
Encrypted storage drive. Decryption can often reveal helpful data files.  Automatically deposits into Home Base when Home Base is accessed.
Found in Paragon Robots.

items.name: CellStorageDrive 1
items.description: Encrypted storage drive. Decryption can often reveal helpful data files. Automatically deposits into Home Base when Home Base is accessed.

items.name: CellStorageDrive 2
items.description: Encrypted storage drive. Decryption can often reveal helpful data files. Automatically deposits into Home Base when Home Base is accessed.

items.name: Combining Bot Scraps
items.description: Scrap part from a combining bot.

items.name: Energy Cell
items.description: Energy cell used to power automation machines and robots.

items.name: Firstbot Scraps
items.description: Scrap parts from a Paragon Firstbots.

items.name: Ground Tank Scraps
items.description: Scrap parts from a Tank.

items.name: Hover Module
items.description:
Main module used for hovering.
Chance to find Salvaged Wires when recycled.

items.name: HoverBot Booster
items.description: Scrap part from a Paragon bot.

items.name: HoverBot Frame Scrap
items.description:
Scrap part from a Paragon bot.
Chance to find Salvaged Wires and HoverBot Booster when recycled.

items.name: HoverBot Gun Scrap
items.description:
Scrap part from a Paragon bot.
Chance to find Salvaged Wires when recycled.

items.name: HoverBot Scraps
items.description: Scrap parts from a Paragon Hoverbots.

items.name: ORBot Scraps
items.description: Scrap parts from a Paragon Orbots.

items.name: Power Core
items.description: Fusion cell used to power turrets and traps.

items.name: Scrap Computer
items.description: An old junk computer. Some usable parts can be pulled from these in the Recycler.

items.name: Scrap Ingot Advanced
items.description:
Combines scrap ingot with Iron ore, creating a stronger metal.
Used for crafting and upgrading items.
Upgraded (Stage 1) scrap blast furnace required.

items.name: Scrap Ingot
items.description:
Used for crafting items.
Obtained from smelting Metal Scraps in a Blast Furnace.

items.name: Scrap Metal Pole
items.description:
Pole made of scrap metal frequently found in Legacy hideouts.
Can be found in scrap bots and scrap huts.

items.name: Scrap Metal
items.description: Metal scrap pieces.

items.name: Scrap ORBot Sphere
items.description: ORBot Sphere dropped from a Paragon ORBot.

items.name: Scrap ORBot Visor
items.description: ORBot Visor dropped from a Paragon ORBot.

items.name: Scrap Spring
items.description:
A rusted spring.
Can be crafted with Scrap Ingot and found in scrap huts.

items.name: Scrap Strut
items.description: Strut dropped from Paragon robots.

items.name: Scrap Super Capacitor
items.description:
An old scrapped super capacitor.
Can be found in scrap bots and scrap huts.

items.name: Solar Panel Scrap
items.description:
Scrapped solar panel.
Can be found in scrap bots and scrap huts.

items.name: Tech Drive
items.description: TBD

items.name: Tech Drive 1
items.description: TBD

items.name: Tech Drive 2
items.description: TBD

items.name: Tech Drive 3
items.description: TBD

items.name: PlayerWeaponDamageMod2
items.description: Increases weapon damage based on weapon level.

items.name: Ammo Cell Pack
items.description:
Plasma based energy dispenser for light weapons and turrets.
Can be found in Paragon Robots.
Can be crafted at the Craft Bench and the Ammo Printer.

items.name: Large Ammo Cell Pack
items.description: Ammo for turrets and AR class energy weapons.

items.name: Rocket Ammo
items.description: Ammo for Rocket class weapons.

items.name: Scrap Metal Pellets
items.description: Scrap metal grinded down into pellets.

items.name: Shotgun Ammo
items.description: Ammo for Shotgun class weapons.

items.name: Sniper Ammo
items.description: Ammo for sniper class weapons.

items.name: AssaultRifle
items.description: Automatic Coilgun Rifle.

items.name: Scrap Shotgun
items.description:
An improvised weapon that uses an electromagnet powered with super capacitors to project metal pellets. 
Uses Shotgun Ammo.

items.name: OrbSniper
items.description: Long range sniper rifle with scope.

items.name: Pistol
items.description: Semi-Automatic Pistol

items.name: Rocket Launcher
items.description: Rocket Launcher.

items.name: SMG
items.description: Extremely fast fire rate at the expense of projectile accuracy. Good for close combat.

items.name: Delivery Bot
items.description: Automatic delivery robot. Poor quality navigation and self driving with low storage capacity.

items.name: Scrap Delivery Bot
items.description: Automatic delivery robot. Very slow and very low capacity.

items.name: Scrap Drop Pickup Bot
items.description: Automatically picks up enemy drops within range.
